code.html: The accordion is a pure JS Component
code.angular:
<db-accordion>
				<db-accordion-item
					title="Item 1"
					content="Content 1"
				></db-accordion-item>
				<db-accordion-item
					title="Item 2"
					content="Content 2"
				></db-accordion-item>
				<db-accordion-item
					title="Item 3"
					content="Content 3"
				></db-accordion-item>
			</db-accordion>
code.react:
<DBAccordion>
			<DBAccordionItem title="Item 1" content="Content 1" />
			<DBAccordionItem title="Item 2" content="Content 2" />
			<DBAccordionItem title="Item 3" content="Content 3" />
		</DBAccordion>
code.vue:
<DBAccordion>
				<DBAccordionItem title="Item 1" content="Content 1" />
				<DBAccordionItem title="Item 2" content="Content 2" />
				<DBAccordionItem title="Item 3" content="Content 3" />
			</DBAccordion>

code.angular:
<db-accordion behaviour="single">
				<db-accordion-item
					title="Item 1"
					content="Content 1"
				></db-accordion-item>
				<db-accordion-item
					title="Item 2"
					content="Content 2"
				></db-accordion-item>
